name: DU/ER No Sweat Pants Slim - Men's
description: Enjoy technical pant features, without looking like you're wearing technical pants. The No Sweat Pants are made of a comfortable, breathable fabric with a touch of stretch for spontaneous adventures.Slim fit sits 2-3 inches below your natural waist, staying close to the body through the thigh, then tapering slightly to the hem.Proprietary blended fabric stretches and moves with you.Fabric breathes well and helps wick moisture away.Water-resistant finish helps repel dirt and oil, letting you go longer between washes.Invisible gusset adds comfort.
